page.title: 15WHAT MY MUM DOES ON A MONDAY
page.content: When I've gone to school she cleans the rabbit out and feeds it then she feeds our cat.Next she puts the washing in the washing machine,then she takes Christopher to playschool and sometimes goes to the shop and butchers.When she gets home she hangs the washing out and hoovers the house and dusts the living room.Then she has a cup of tea and a biscuit.If she has time she makes the beds before she gets Christopher from playschool.When she gets home she makes lunch.After lunch she does the washing up and sometimes she does some gardening or some cake making.When we asked our mothers about living in Flamstead they said they liked it but didn't like having to go long distances to shop or take their children to the dentist or doctor.On the whole they like living in Flamstead.
